com.amplifyframework.auth.cognito.util

Class SignInStateConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.auth.cognito.util.SignInStateConverter

  • public final class SignInStateConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Helpful util class to convert AWSMobileClient sign in state enum to the Amplify equivalent.

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthSignInStep

        public static AuthSignInStep getAuthSignInStep(SignInState fromState)
                                        throws AuthException
        Take an old AWSMobileClient SignInState and convert it to the proper corresponding value in Amplify Auth.
        Parameters:
        fromState - the AWSMobileClient state to convert from
        Returns:
        The new Auth State enum which corresponds to the old state
        Throws:
        AuthException - Thrown if the AWSMobileClient state is not supported in Amplify Auth
